attributes.action: commission a regulatory body for all computer services (IT)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Computer services (IT) is a fast expanding industry and yet there is still no real licensing or regulations involved to both recognise companies who offer computer services by a certain standard and to also protect the public/customer against the ever expanding amount of businesses and individuals who claim to offer computer services, however do not have a background or education/knowledge in computing which is required to offer a service to the public.

The financial sector is regulated, lots of tradesman for example plumbers are regulated and can receive a creditation. Lets bring this to the IT Industry and get rid of the cowboys!
